Name: Daiquiri (on-the-rocks)
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime slice & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Light and refreshing. No one flavour predominates - sweet and sour are in harmony with the rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Daiquiri (on-the-rocks) contains 174 calories
